ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh, heck, it s been too long, just buy and read the basic blacksmithing book... ... From: Nathaniel Niles  To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh, heck, it's been too long, just buy and read the basic blacksmithing
book...

-----Original Message-----
From: Nathaniel Niles <nniles@...>
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 6:12 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Studs and Bonding


>From: "Nathaniel Niles" <nniles@...>
>
>Studs require one metal bits, one water flask, one file.
>Files require two metal bits (unstacked), one water flask, one file mold.
>Metal bits require two small ores (unstacked), one water flask.
>
>You'll have to check the basic blacksmithing book for the ingredients for
>steel BONING (note the spelling).
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: McConnell, Jeff <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>To: 'EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com' <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>
>Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 11:06 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Studs and Bonding
>
>
>>From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>>
>>Thank you but how many metal bits.
>>
>>

>>> From: Tim West [SMTP:twest@...]

>>> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>>> Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Studs and Bonding
>>>
>>> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>> Metal studs require: water flask, file, and metal bits.
>>> Files require: water flask, metal bits, and a file mold.
>>>
>>>
>>>
